## Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Load Functions

```{r}
source("simulation_functions.R")
```

## Basic test of defaults

```{r}
initial_times_and_conditions() %>%
  turn_input2_off_and_on(off_at_min = 10, on_at_min = 60) %>%
  run_euler() %>%
  select(-input1, -input2) %>%
  pivot_longer(-t_minutes) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = t_minutes, y = value, color = name)) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 1)
```
